plot: When investigating a series of brutal murders committed on criminals, to Nick it appears that the culprit may be a character from a Latino legend.

Since barrio model boy Andres Venegas was beaten in a coma by unprovoked bullies and his mother invoked heavenly justice, criminals in the neighborhood fall victim one by one to horrible deaths. While reassuring Juliette he's not having an affair but simply contacted by his mother, who must be in real trouble, Nick realizes the vindictive nature of the crime spree. Juliette takes him to a Latin medium who explains it's the doing of El Cucuy, a supernatural avenger who is invoked by cries for justice and leaves after purging the area.—KGF Vissers
